basics.label: Senior Electrical Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Electrical Engineer and veteran with a Master's in Business (MBA) and extensive experience in industrial controls, defense, and program management. Specialized in embedded systems, R&D, and prototyping. Proven track record of managing budgets and leading teammates in high-stakes environments.

highlights: Lead R&D initiatives focusing on embedded systems and firmware programming.
Manage cross-functional teammates and oversee project budget allocation to ensure milestones are met.
Develop prototypes involving PCB design and IoT integration.
Drive technical program management strategies bridging engineering and business requirements.
Led squad-level operations and managed personnel logistics.
Responsible for equipment maintenance and operational readiness.
demonstrated leadership under pressure and adherence to strict protocols.

projects.name: EchoFlux
projects.description: Developing a desk-mounted, contactless gesture controller using AWR6843AOPEVM and RP2350 MCU.

projects.name: Financial Hub Automation
projects.description: Python-based system to automate the processing and visualization of financial documents.

projects.name: Human Presence Detector
projects.description: Built a detection system utilizing DFRobot C4001 mmWave sensor and Raspberry Pi Pico.
